name: Invigorating Surge
originalText: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control, then double the number of +1/+1 counters on that creature.

rulings.text: To double the number of +1/+1 counters on a creature, put a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to the number it already has. Other cards that interact with putting counters on it will interact with this effect accordingly.

text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control, then double the number of +1/+1 counters on that creature.
